long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create QR-codes without ever leaving your website!

Text is converted in real time to a QR-Code as you type or paste. The extension is conveniently placed to transfer text data such as URL links, usernames, passwords and even paragraphs to your phone.

The QR-codes can represent text data just by typing or pasting into the text input area. By entering this data, a QR-code is efficiently generated and is ready to be scanned. This extension is not heavy on resources as it is extremely lightweight in terms of memory and space, and utilizes an efficient algorithm for generating QR-Codes.
